Uses of Interface
com.picocontainer.ComponentAdapter

  • Packages that use ComponentAdapter 
    Package Description
    com.picocontainer
    This package contains the core API for PicoContainer, a compact container for working with the dependency injection pattern.
    com.picocontainer.adapters  
    com.picocontainer.behaviors
    BehaviorFactories make Behaviors which change aspects of component implementations and instances.
    com.picocontainer.classname  
    com.picocontainer.containers
    Containers are the main user entry point for PicoContainer.
    com.picocontainer.injectors
    InjectionFactories make Injectors which implement specific types of dependency injection.
    com.picocontainer.lifecycle
    Alternative implementations of lifecycle strategy for use with a container.
    com.picocontainer.monitors
    A Monitor is something PicoContainer uses to inform on events in component instantiation and lifecycle.
    com.picocontainer.parameters
    In the PicoContainer API, Parameters are used for specifying which constructor argument (or setter argument) goes where.
    com.picocontainer.security  
    com.picocontainer.visitors
    This package contains various implementations of visitors.

    • Uses of ComponentAdapter in com.picocontainer

      Subinterfaces of ComponentAdapter in com.picocontainer 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ChangedBehavior<T>
      Behaviors modify the components created by a Injector with additional behaviors
      interface  Injector<T>
      Implementers are responsible for instantiating and injecting dependancies into Constructors, Methods and Fields.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DefaultPicoContainer.KnowsContainerAdapter<T>
      Decorator that binds an adapter to a particular PicoContainer instance.
      static class  DefaultPicoContainer.LateInstance<T>
      Special Case class that is an adapter instantiated when a component monitor returns a "late resolution" to finding a container.
